articles.author: John Smith
articles.title: Major DeFi Protocol Hacked for $10M in Latest Exploit
articles.description: A popular DeFi protocol suffered a $10 million hack due to a smart contract vulnerability. The attacker's wallet 0xDEMO0001 has been identified.
articles.content: The DeFi ecosystem faced another major setback as hackers exploited a vulnerability...
